steps.step: Add enough oil to a pan or fryer to cover the sopapillas when melted (about 5 cm deep). Heat to 370.
Divide dough into 2 balls and roll 3 mm thick, then cut each into 8 wedges. Or roll entire dough into a sheet 3 mm thick and cut into 12 cm squares.
Deep fry each sopapilla in the oil, a few at a time. They should puff up. When first side has browned, after 2 minutes, flip and brown other side, another 2 minutes.
Remove from oil and place on a plate lined with a paper towel. Repeat with each triangle.
Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar while warm.
